Ah, so it is agreed then, as it is quite clear, as the season premier was a TWO parter, the first TWO episodes were released on the same night, thus making this episode, Instant Karma, episode FIVE (5). Thanks, masterac for clearing that up.

Since there has been a lot of debate (i.e., flaming) about this, I decided to go ahead and write an e-mail to Ask Fox (Ask.Fox@fox.com) so that FOX would explain. Here's what they said:

"It can be either - depending on how you define the 2-Hour Premiere.  The scheduling/programming Departments consider every hour an episode - and so the 2-Hour premiere was numbered 601/602 - each hour given a number - and at the end of the day, production is making 22 hours of the show this season - two of which count as the 2-Hour Premiere - but it is, afterall, just one episode - so on FOX ON DEMAND they have 4 episodes - one of which happens to be a 2-Hour ep."

So that's the definitive answer, guys. It can be either. I prefer to think that it's episode 5, but that's just my bureaucratic nature.

Cheers!
